<script>
(function () {
  const carousel = document.querySelector('.carousel');
  if (!carousel) return;

  const track = carousel.querySelector('.carousel-track');
  const slides = Array.from(track.children);
  const prev = carousel.querySelector('.arrow.prev');
  const next = carousel.querySelector('.arrow.next');

  const slideWidth = () => track.clientWidth;

  const currentIndex = () => {
    const w = track.clientWidth;
    return Math.round(track.scrollLeft / Math.max(1, w));
  };

  const goTo = (i) => {
    const n = slides.length;
    const target = ((i % n) + n) % n; // wrap
    track.scrollTo({ left: target * slideWidth(), behavior: 'smooth' });
  };

  prev.addEventListener('click', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); goTo(currentIndex() - 1); });
  next.addEventListener('click', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); goTo(currentIndex() + 1); });

  // Keep the current slide aligned when resizing
  let resizeTO;
  window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
    clearTimeout(resizeTO);
    resizeTO = setTimeout(() => goTo(currentIndex()), 150);
  });
})();
</script>
